content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols direct link to pattern pdf 1 you can t really see it in the photo but the bottom of the bag is a pouch that buttons shut for securing your keys or other small items **tools/materials ** * japanese size 4/0 crochet hook 2 5mm * approximately 35g 68 25 meters of color a * 80g 156 meters of color b the gauge listed is 8 cm for the bottom of the bag which should be 8 row and 15 cm for 8 row of the side pattern pattern stitch **note ** pattern does not include the flower corsage shown attached to the bag the pattern for the corsage can be found here 2 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/28ss/41 pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/28-47-pearl-rame-linen-corsage
